channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MO

item.title: Report X-2023101163
item.description:
Report X-2023101163

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-11
  • City: COLUMBIA
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS IN HMMS, RESPONDER CALLED THE HELP DESK WAS TOLD TO OPEN BOX. RESPONDER FOUND EQUIPMENT WITH BATTERIES (LITHIUM ION BATTERIES CONTAINED IN EQUIPMENT - 4 GASALERT MICROCLIP XL DETECTORS THAT CONTAIN RECHARGEABLE LITHIUM ION BATTERIES). PACKAGE ALSO CONTAINS 1 MSA ALTAIR PRO DETECTOR WITH A LITHIUM METAL BUTTON CELL BATTERY INSTALLED IN EQUIPMENT. UNDECLARED HAZMAT BEING PROCESSED.
